00030 void FilterLogViewDeletedItem::setValues( KDateTime date, QString sender, QString account, QString subject )
00031 {
00032   //store values
00033   this->date = date;
00034   this->sender = sender;
00035   this->account = account;
00036   this->subject = subject;
00037 
00038   //set column text
00039   setText( ColDate, date.toString( KDateTime::LocalDate ) );
00040   setText( ColSender, sender );
00041   setText( ColAccount, account );
00042   setText( ColSubject, subject );
00043 }
